message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and stance detection. It could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the authors use machine learning techniques to develop their system. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as the task involves retrieving relevant information to verify the veracity of a claim. Finally, it could also be classified under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as the authors use neural networks in their approach.
